head.supplied: ¶ [...] ¶ P.S. I have lately learned from Dr Mueller your desire to have both the Cranbourne Meteorites. As Director of the Colonial Museum here I thought it shd not be deprived of all but as Mr Abel...

div.p: From Frederick McCoy to Richard Owen
Outward letter book 2, no. 62/35, National Museum of Victoria, Melbourne.

[...]
Text not relevant to M omitted.

P.S. I have lately learned from Dr Mueller your desire to have both the Cranbourne Meteorites. As Director of the Colonial Museum here I thought it shd not be deprived of all but as Mr Abel has sent home one of the large masses to the Exhibition for sale to the Brit. Mus. afterwards I have agreed (although it wd be a great pity) to the somewhat larger one remaining being cut in two one half for each of our Museums. The Governor however has just suggested that if you were to buy Abels Meteorite & send it all for the museum here we cd send you the much larger one entire wh. wd. probably be the most satisfactory solution of the difficulty for all parties.
